pages.text: The Element Constructor has a very simple recipe. All you need is a crafting table and a glass pane! $(br2)$(o)Note: the recipe can be placed in any slots in a crafting table, just as long as the glass pane is on top of the crafting table.

pages.title: Element Constructor
pages.text: Pretty simple huh? Well, things get a little more complicated from here on, so be careful!
